item.title: Webinar Friday February 6: Carousel Digital Signage
item.description: Join Jim Evans, Director of MultiMedia Services, on Friday February 6 from 11am-12pm, for a hands-on training session and learn how to create and publish slides on RPI’s digital signage system, Carousel Digital Signage. Whether you’re promoting a lecture, club event, or campus initiative—this session will help you get your message on screens across RPI. Register now: https://rensselaer.webex.com/webappng/sites/rensselaer/webinar/webinarSeries/register/783d951c6ab8482e9198a7bd6075a700

item.title: Congratulations to Professor Douglas Swank
item.description: Professor Douglas Swank has been selected to receive the Marion J. Siegman Annual Award Lectureship from the American Physiological Society! Dr. Swank’s work has helped advance how we understand how muscles function, contributing important insights that support future discoveries in health and medicine. As part of this recognition, he has been invited to present an award lecture at the American Physiology Summit, taking place April 23-26 in Minneapolis. This well-deserved recognition reflects…

item.title: 2026 Annual Conflict of Interest and Commitment Survey
item.description:
The Compliance Office is excited to announce a new web-based system for faculty and designated staff (COI Disclosers) to complete the Conflict of Interest and Commitment survey. All COI Disclosers will receive an email from Huron Consulting Group, our vendor offering the system, on Monday, February 2, directing them to the new survey. Questions should be directed to compliance@rpi.edu.
